alert.note: Alert for Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:36PM EDT until August 11 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR GEORGETOWN...HORRY AND MARION COUNTIES... At 336 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Georgetown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Georgetown, Marion, DeBordieu Colony, Mullins, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River, Yawkey South Island, Murrells Inlet, Little River Entrance, Winyah Bay Entrance, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, and North Myrtle Beach Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
